creator: wburrows@e2open.com
text:
- similar to existence prob in WebdavResource.java for paths with 
spaces. The lock is stored in the hashmap by parseResponse with an escaped 
path. The check for existence of a lock on the resource uses an unescaped path 
so it wouldn't find the lock. I changed it to add the lock to the hashmap with 
the unescaped path so that its found.

creator: wburrows@e2open.com
text: Reopening as I shouldn't have changed state myself.
